        Parameters:

        query - The base query to send
        args - Extra args to replace into the query

      • query

        public static java.sql.ResultSet query​(@NotNull
                                       @NotNull java.sql.Connection connection,
                                       @NotNull
                                       @NotNull java.lang.String query,
                                       java.lang.String @NotNull ... args)
                                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Execute a mysql query and return the result

        The returned ResultSet *must* be closed by you to prevent memory leaks

        Parameters:
        connection - The connection to execute on
        query - The base query to send
        args - Extra args to replace into the query
        Returns:
        The result of the query
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - When an SQLException is throw by the driver
        Since:
        3.4.0
